user_stories.title: Clean backlog picker display
user_stories.story: As a developer using /isdlc feature (no description), I want the backlog picker to display clean item titles without the -> [requirements](...) suffix, so that I can easily select the feature I want to work on.

user_stories.title: Correct parsing of all index format variants
user_stories.story: As a developer, I want the backlog picker to correctly parse all item variants in the new BACKLOG.md format (checked, unchecked, with/without links, with sub-bullets), so that the picker shows exactly the open items.

user_stories.title: Jira metadata preserved
user_stories.story: As a developer with Jira-backed backlog items, I want the picker to continue showing Jira ticket IDs next to items, so that I can cross-reference with my Jira board.

user_stories.title: Test coverage verification
user_stories.story: As a maintainer, I want the existing backlog test files to be verified and updated for the new format, so that regressions are caught automatically.

user_stories.title: Start action workflow evaluation
user_stories.story: As a framework developer, I want to know whether the start action needs its own workflows.json entry, so that the framework configuration is complete and consistent.
